Module: Build

This module will contain readings and experiences designed to get you actually writing code. We’ve taken a long time to get here, and we’ll still take it slow.

Learning Outcomes

Students will write and improve on working Python code

Readings

Python modules and packages

Written by your instructor; feedback welcome

30 min

Experiential Learning

Create your own toy Python package

Follow a tutorial, write a tiny bit of code

1 pt 30 minutes due 12 Oct
